message: Do you use Workflowy for to-dos?  Or do you use a dedicated to-do list manager?
aah signed up and found the share system.  nice  I really like this app.

Looks cool.  I've tried a number of different todo-list applications and eventually for some reason the app fails to fullfil some requirement of mine.  The interface looks solid.  Do you know off hand if workflowy will allow me to share a workflow list to another user?  That is a major requirement as I need to at least share a todo list with my wife :)
I've been using it for a few months to track todos at work.  I love how easy it is to move items around.  It doesn't impose a system on you, either, just lets you brain dump.  Nice and simple.
Works very well on my iPhone in Safari.
we love workflowy here at crowdbooster
I loved it and thought it was great. For about a week. Back to pen and paper. Literally
@peterbe Why u back to pen and paper??
I love this app, I wish it will get offline support!
I just setup a private group here in convore and use it for my to-do workflow. Before that I was using evernote which I still use for info storage.
i only use evernote best way to mange any programing idea into a prototype
Is there an API to workflowy?
